first_para: Robert John Walter MP (born May 30, 1948), is the Conservative Member of Parliament for North Dorset in south west England. He was re-elected for a fourth term in 2010 with a much increased majority.

full.extract: Robert John Walter MP (born May 30, 1948), is the Conservative Member of Parliament for North Dorset in south west England. He was re-elected for a fourth term in 2010 with a much increased majority.
full.title: Robert Walter (politician)
